biotools.summary: The DSMZ's Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase (BacDive) focuses on providing organism-linked information covering the multifarious aspects of bacterial biodiversity: taxonomic classification, morphology, physiology, cultivation, origin natural habitat and more, both for bacterial and archaeal strains. BacDiveR helps you investigate this data offline, and semi-automatically in R.

bioschemas.name: BacDiveR: A Programmatic Interface For BacDive
